arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund vs Athletic Club – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund and Athletic Club de Blibao prepare to lock horns in the UEFA Champions League this Wednesday. Both teams are eager to secure their maiden win in the league phase, with Dortmund aiming to leverage their impressive momentum at home against a Bilbao side marking their return to Europe’s elite. Borussia Dortmund team news […] The post Borussia Dortmund vs Athletic Club – Predicted lineup and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund vs. Athletic Bilbao: UEFA Champions League LIVE blog and team news
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund are out to get their first win of the league phase in the 2025/26 UEFA Champions League when Athletic Bilbao visit the Signal Iduna Park on Wednesday (kick-off: 9pm CEST). Ernesto Valverde’s side had started the season with three straight wins in La Liga but have since managed just a single point – a 1-1 draw at home to Girona – in four league outings since to drop down the table.

arts.ttl: Why Borussia Dortmund will beat Athletic Bilbao in the UEFA Champions League
arts.sum: With the Niko Kovač revolution gathering pace, UEFA Champions League opponents Athletic Bilbao are next in line to feel the fury of a Borussia Dortmund side unbeaten so far this season. Away from the bread and butter of the Bundesliga, BVB have marched through to the DFB Cup second round and were desperately unlucky not to start their Champions League campaign with a win after playing out an eight-goal thriller at Juventus a fortnight ago.

arts.ttl: Serhou Guirassy passed fit for Borussia Dortmund’s clash against Athletic Club
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund host Athletic Club on Matchday 2 of the 2025/26 UEFA Champions League. Speaking ahead of Wednesday’s game, BVB head coach Niko Kovač confirmed that Serhou Guirassy has been…

arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund vs Athletic Bilbao predictions: BVB to overpower goal-shy visitors
arts.sum: Athletic Bilbao are firing blanks and Steve Davies believes that spells real trouble away to Borussia Dortmund in the league phase of the Champions League.

arts.ttl: Guirassy takes part in Dortmund's final training session ahead of Athletic Club clash
arts.sum: Serhou Guirassy is back in training ahead of Borussia Dortmund's Champions League fixture against Athletic Club on Wednesday.
